Energy-efficient LED bulbs: Replace traditional bulbs with energy-efficient LED bulbs that use less energy and have a longer lifespan.
Natural lighting: Utilize natural light by opening curtains and blinds during the day to let in as much sunlight as possible.
Outdoor activities: Spend more time outdoors during the day to take advantage of natural light and fresh air.
Indoor plants: Incorporate indoor plants into your living or working space, as they can help purify the air and provide a natural source of light.
Artificial lighting: Invest in energy-efficient artificial lighting options, such as LED or CFL bulbs, and use them strategically throughout the day and night.
